p.b: The current edition of the OpenMath Standard is OpenMath Version 2.0 Revision 1.

page.p: OpenMath Version 1.0 and OpenMath Version 1.1 are also available.

ul.li: A Type System For OpenMath. This document describes a formal type system with dependent function types and products, based on the Extended Calculus of Constructions, which can be used to augment the information in content dictionaries.

A Small OpenMath Type System. As an alternative to the "ECC" type system we also propose a "Small Type System" that is a more light weight system, specifically designed to be used with OpenMath objects.
